remove_errors.description: Whether to enable SugarC's remove_errors functionality (default False).

included_files_and_directories.description: Specification for the files and directories to include, on a per-file basis if necessary.

file_pattern.description: A regular expression to apply to the filename. If the regular expression is found within the filename, then we use the specified included directories and files. Note that patterns are applied in the order specified here. If this is not included, the rule will match every file.

build_script.description: The location of the build script.

makefile_location.description: Where the makefile is (note that we will write sample configurations to this directory/.config

source_location.description: Where the source code will be after running the build_script.
